DataElement.preferredName: Infusion Catheter Placement Location Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of another vessel location, not previously specified, in which an infusion catheter tip is placed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body._A flexible tube designed to transfer fluids into or out of the body._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study._
